tit.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。

sen.j: 京極 高鎮（きょうごく たかつね、文化 (元号)7年（1810年）- 天保5年6月23日 (旧暦)（1834年7月29日））は、丹後国峰山藩の第9代藩主。
sen.e: Takatsune KYOGOKU (1810-July 29, 1834) was the ninth lord of the Mineyama Domain of the Tango Province.
Takatsune KYOGOKU (1810-July 29, 1834) was the ninth lord of Mineyama Domain of Tango Province.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。The Mineyama Domain, the Tango Province の the をそれぞれ削除しました。
sen.e: Takatsune KYOGOKU (1810-July 29, 1834) was the ninth lord of Mineyama Domain of Tango Province.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 第7代藩主・京極高備の七男。
sen.e: He was the seventh son of the seventh lord of the domain, Takamasa KYOGOKU.
He was the seventh son of Takamasa KYOGOKU, the seventh lord of the domain.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。語順を入れ替えました。
sen.e: He was the seventh son of Takamasa KYOGOKU, the seventh lord of the domain.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 第8代藩主・京極高倍の弟。
sen.e: He was the younger brother of the eighth lord of the domain, Takamasu KYOGOKU
He was the younger brother Takamasu KYOGOKU, the eighth lord of the domain.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。語順を入れ替えました。
sen.e: He was the younger brother Takamasu KYOGOKU, the eighth lord of the domain.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: His official rank is unknown.
His official court rank is unknown.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。official rank を official court rank に修正しました。
sen.e: His official court rank is unknown.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: His childhood name was Tomigoro.
His childhood name was Tomigoro.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。
sen.e: His childhood name was Tomigoro.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: Atsukichi was another childhood name for him.
Atsukichi was another childhood name for him.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。
sen.e: Atsukichi was another childhood name for him.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: Toranosuke was still another childhood name for him.
Toranosuke was still another childhood name for him.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。
sen.e: Toranosuke was still another childhood name for him.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 天保4年（1833年）12月5日に兄で先代藩主の高倍が嗣子無くして死去したため、その後を継いで翌天保5年（1834年）に藩主となった。
sen.e: Since his elder brother and predecessor lord of the domain, Takamasu, died without a child heir on December 5, 1833, Takatsune succeeded to Takamasu to become the lord of the domain in the following year, 1834.
Since his older brother and former lord of the domain, Takamasu, died without a child heir on January 14, 1834, Takatsune succeeded to Takamasu's position in the same year.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。全文修正しました。
sen.e: Since his older brother and former lord of the domain, Takamasu, died without a child heir on January 14, 1834, Takatsune succeeded to Takamasu's position in the same year.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: しかし在位半年の同年6月23日に江戸にて死去した。
sen.e: Takatsune, however, died in Edo in the sixth month of his reign, on June 23, 1834.
Takatsune, however, died in Edo in the sixth month of his reign, on July 29, 1834.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。June 23 を July 29 に修正しました。
sen.e: Takatsune, however, died in Edo in the sixth month of his reign, on July 29, 1834.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: He died at the age of 25.
He died at the age of 25.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。
sen.e: He died at the age of 25.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 嗣子が無く、後を養子の京極高景が継いだ。
sen.e: Since he had no child of his own, his adopted son Takakage KYOGOKU succeeded to him.
Since he had no child of his own, his adopted son Takakage KYOGOKU succeeded to him.
sen.cmt: 「terms/対訳・定訳」に記載されていた訳を trans 1 に移動しました。
sen.e: Since he had no child of his own, his adopted son Takakage KYOGOKU succeeded to him.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
